name: Spicy Chicken Tacos
description: Juicy chicken marinated in spices, served in warm tortillas with fresh salsa, guacamole, and a sprinkle of cheese.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Thin crust pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty grilled to perfection, served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi including tuna, salmon, shrimp, and avocado rolls, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Pad Thai Noodles
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and scrambled egg, tossed in a tangy tamarind sauce.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender pieces of chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce with a blend of aromatic spices, served with rice or naan bread.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing with crunchy croutons, grated Parmesan cheese, and grilled chicken strips.

name: Beef Pho
description: Fragrant beef broth served with rice noodles, thinly sliced beef, bean sprouts, fresh herbs, and a squeeze of lime.

name: Cheese Quesadillas
description: Flour tortillas filled with melted cheese, served with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole on the s_ide.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Stir-fried rice with succulent shrimp, mixed vegetables, scrambled egg, and soy sauce, garnished with green onions.
